resource.name: Personal Income Tax Statistics By Zip Code
resource.description: This dataset contains data from California resident tax returns filed with California adjusted gross income and self-assessed tax listed by zip code.  This dataset contains data for taxable years 1992 to the most recent tax year available.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'CA - Counties' (fs3r-2bk8) the point in column 'county_geo_reference' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'CA - Places KML' (svgd-j6jz) the point in column 'county_geo_reference' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'California Places Boundaries' (8xky-9gpe) the point in column 'county_geo_reference' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

Percentage of the taxable liability amount within each AGIC range out of the total taxable liability amount of all AGIC ranges.
Cumulative percentage of the number of returns within each AGIC out of the total number of returns.
Cumulative percentage of the percent of adjusted gross income.
Percentage of the taxable income amount within each AGIC range out of the total taxable income amount of all AGI class ranges.
Cumulative percentage of the taxable income amount within each AGIC range out of the total taxable income amount of all AGIC ranges.
Taxable liability amount of each AGIC range.
Adjusted Gross Income Category (AGIC) is the category of taxpayers whose income falls within a specified adjusted gross income range.
Number of returns filed.
Total California Adjusted Gross Income (AGIC) before California deductions.
Percentage of the adjusted gross income (AGI) amount out of the total adjusted gross income.
California taxable income amount of each AGIC range.
Percent	Cumulative percentage of the taxable liability amount within each AGIC range out of the total taxable liability amount of all AGIC ranges.
